Name: Verdi
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of pineapple wedge on rim.
Review: A melange of fruits combine in this slightly sweet, gluggable, short drink.
History: Adapted from a drink discovered in 2002 at the Fifth Floor Bar in Harvey Nichols, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Verdi contains 152 calories
